title: TurboTides
description: An integrated design platform for turbomachinery, covering turbines, pumps, compressors, and turbines

title: OpTides
description: A comprehensive, unified platform for the integrated design of fluid and structural systems

title: FloTides
description: Advanced system simulation software tailored for fluid network design

title: SeniorWorks
description: Analysis software for structural fatigue, crack propagation and life prediction

title: OASIS
description: The 4th generation intelligent optimizer, driving superior industrial design optimization

title: RomTides
description: Software for data modeling, and model order reduction for time-sensitive applications
